WELLCOME_MESSAGE: Welcome to the Image Analyzer bot! I'm here to assist you.
INVALID_FILE_TYPE_ERROR: Invalid input. Please only provide images (jpeg/jpg/png) or plain text
GENERIC_ERROR_MESSAGE: Something went wrong while processing your request. Please try again later.
EMPTY_RESPONSE_MESSAGE: I'm sorry, but I couldn't generate a response at the moment. Please try again later or provide more information so I can assist you better.
MessageDetailsFetchingError: An error occured while fetching the details of the message. Please try again later.
NO_MESSAGE_ERROR: I'm sorry, but I couldn't find any text or images. Please provide an image or text so I can assist you better.
INVALID_REQUEST_MESSAGE: I'm sorry, but I couldn't understand your request. Please provide an image or text so I can assist you better.
